actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a reduction in the number of Federal employees through voluntary attrition.

summary.text: Federal Attritions Timetable - Requires a ten percent reduction in the number of Federal employees from the number of such employees on December 1, 1978, to be attained by voluntary attrition by calendar year 1983.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a reduction in the number of Federal employees through voluntary attrition.
